Activity: Log in to the EHR system, check emails for any updates or urgent patient data entries. Review the list of patients whose data needs to be entered.
Start entering patient data into the EHR, focusing on accuracy and completeness. Cross-check with physical records if necessary.
Take a short break, grab a coffee, and chat with colleagues @rn-1 @rn-2 @rn-3 about any patient data discrepancies noticed.
Continue entering patient data into the EHR. Flag any inconsistencies or missing information for follow-up.
Attend a training session on new workflows with @trainer-1 and @clinlead-1. Participate actively and ask questions.
Provide feedback on the new workflows to @trainer-1 and @clinlead-1, highlighting any challenges or suggestions for improvement.
Wrap up the day by reviewing the patient data entered and ensuring all tasks are completed. Send a summary email to @mrs-1 @mrs-2.
